name: graph_agent
description: Graph agent for querying relationships, connections, and account information from the knowledge graph

query.description: User's natural language query about relationships, connections, or account information and all the context the agent needs to answer it. Do not write graph query or any other code, just provide a detailed description of what the user is looking for. Include any relevant details such as account names, timeframes, metrics, or specific data points mentioned by the user.

accounts_mentioned.description: List of account names/aliases mentioned in the query, or null if none.
